text: Herbie Rides Again is a 1974 American sports comedy movie directed by Robert Stevenson from a screenplay by Bill Walsh, based on a story by Gordon Buford. It is the second installment in the Herbie movie series and the sequel to The Love Bug (1968). It stars Helen Hayes, Stefanie Powers, Ken Berry and Keenan Wynn reprising his villainous role as Alonzo Hawk (originated in the films The Absent-Minded Professor and Son of Flubber). title: Herbie Rides Again
